hero.title: Digital Agency in France - Website Creation & Mobile App Development
hero.subtitle: Your partner for successful digital transformation
hero.description: Numispark is your web agency in France specializing in website creation and custom application development.
hero.details: Ideally located in France and operating throughout France, we support businesses in their digital transformation with creativity, technical expertise, and a results-focused approach.

about.title: Who are we?
about.description: Numispark is a French digital agency that supports businesses in their digital development.
about.mission: Our multidisciplinary team combines technical expertise and creative vision to design high-performance web and mobile solutions.
about.experience: With over 60 projects completed for clients across all sectors, from small businesses to large corporations, we put our expertise at the service of your digital growth.

vision.title: Discovery and Analysis
vision.description: We work closely together to understand your objectives, challenges, and ambitions. This phase includes analysis of your market, competition, and current trends to identify the best opportunities.
vision.deliverables: Deliverables: Complete audit, analysis report, strategic recommendations

planning.description: Transformation of ideas into structured plans with prototypes to visualize the final project and ensure strategic clarity. This approach allows us to refine the user experience and optimize conversion paths.

development.title: Agile Development
development.description: Transformation of concepts into fully functional solutions through harmonious design and robust development for optimal performance. We work in iterations, allowing you to track progress and adjust the project along the way.

launch.title: Testing and Deployment
launch.description: Rigorous testing to ensure your solution is problem-free, optimized, and ready for a smooth launch. We verify cross-browser and cross-device compatibility, security, and performance.
launch.deliverables: Deliverables: Test reports, optimized final version, user training

support.title: Maintenance and Evolution
support.description: Precise deployment and post-launch support to maintain smooth and efficient operation, with regular updates and continuous improvement recommendations.
support.deliverables: Options: Custom maintenance contracts, technical support, continuous optimization

private.name: Website Development
private.content: Private Honors is revolutionizing travel. Save on every booking by getting cashback, manage travel with ease and enjoy VIP customer service. Discover a new way to travel, smarter and more profitable.

aviator.name: Mobile App Development
aviator.content: The development of Aviator's Oasis focused on creating a seamless user experience, blending functionality with a visually appealing interface. Users can effortlessly navigate through various features, including forums for discussing flight experiences, photo sharing galleries, and real-time flight tracking.
aviator.backendDevelopment: Backend Development with Node.js and Express

ecommerce.name: E-commerce SEO
ecommerce.content:
**SEO Strategy Development**

We conducted a comprehensive SEO audit to identify key improvement areas and developed a customized strategy specifically tailored for this eCommerce project.

**On-Page SEO**

We enhanced product content, meta tags, headers, and images to boost keyword relevance and improve user experience, with a focus on floral keywords and seasonal trends.

**Technical SEO**

We resolved technical issues by integrating the website with Google Search Console, optimizing the sitemap, and refining the robots.txt file to enhance site performance and indexability.

**Off-Page SEO**

We executed a targeted link-building campaign and leveraged social media platforms to increase domain authority and boost online presence, targeting local influencers and specialized floral blogs.

**Conclusion**

Through a holistic approach covering strategy development, on-page optimizations, technical enhancements, and off-page initiatives, we achieved a remarkable improvement in organic search traffic, demonstrating the effectiveness of a comprehensive SEO campaign.

feedback1.name: Lydia DUAN - Project Manager
feedback1.feedback: Numispark team wrote several SEO blog articles in Spanish for our client specialized in Travel & Tourism. The articles are of high quality, and their adaptable writing style truly shines. Thank you so much for your outstanding work, Numispark!

feedback2.name: Olivier LENOIR - Executive
feedback2.feedback: We’ve been working with Numispark almost daily for over a year now. They are always deeply involved and dedicated to delivering the best results, constantly bringing fresh ideas to the table. Always available and a pleasure to work with, I highly recommend Numispark!

feedback3.name: Claire MAINAUD - Personal Development Coach
feedback3.feedback: I reached out to Numispark for my website and communication strategy. The team is incredibly pleasant, always available, proactive, and great listeners. I wholeheartedly recommend contacting Numispark for your professional projects—I'm confident they will exceed your expectations! I never hesitate to speak highly of them to everyone in my network!

feedback4.name: Léo NISHIBAYASHI - Educational Coordinator
feedback4.feedback: Numispark provided excellent training at our school, Rocket School! We engaged them for a one-week session in copywriting and content marketing for a group of Growth Hackers. Our students really appreciated it! Numispark is professional and has outstanding teaching skills—they perfectly adapt to the needs of both the institution and the learners. We’re already planning to invite them back for sessions on BizDev, CSM, and Growth, and we can’t wait for their return!

feedback5.name: Private Honors - Manager
feedback5.feedback: I hired Numispark to develop our web application Private Honors. The development team was incredibly pleasant and truly understood the needs of our product. I’m extremely happy with the result and am now working with them on SEO and marketing.

projectTypes.question: What types of projects can a web agency like Numispark handle?
projectTypes.answer: As a web agency in France, Numispark supports businesses with all their digital needs: website creation (showcase, e-commerce, portal), web and mobile application development, existing site redesign, SEO strategy, web marketing, UX/UI design, and custom SaaS solution development. Our multidisciplinary team adapts to the size and complexity of your project.

industryAdaptation.question: Does Numispark adapt to my industry?
industryAdaptation.answer: Absolutely! Our experience covers many sectors: e-commerce, B2B and B2C services, education, coaching, tourism, real estate, healthcare, industry, etc. We take the time to understand the specificities of your sector to offer solutions adapted to your challenges and your audience. Our client references testify to our ability to adapt to various environments.

ownership.question: Do I own my site/application upon delivery?
ownership.answer: Yes, you are fully owner of your site or application once the project is delivered and paid. We transfer all source codes, access, and necessary documentation. We also favor open-source technologies and solutions without proprietary dependencies to guarantee your long-term independence.

postLaunch.question: Can I get support after launch?
postLaunch.answer: We offer several post-launch support packages to ensure the sustainability of your project: technical maintenance contracts, user support, functional developments, and continuous optimization.

timeline.question: What are your timelines and how do you guarantee punctuality?
timeline.answer: Our timelines vary depending on project complexity. Our agile methodology, with regular checkpoints and detailed planning, allows us to meet agreed deadlines. In case of unforeseen circumstances, we inform you immediately and propose adapted solutions.

cta.title: Transform your digital project into reality
cta.description: Ready to bring your vision to life? Our team of experts is available to discuss your needs and offer adapted solutions. Benefit from a free audit of your online presence and a personalized quote with no commitment.
